title: Seeing blood in a dream comes from another person for single and married women and men

preview.html: We will learn about many interpretive cases related to seeing blood in a dream through the following topic, so follow us to learn more from Mufsir.com. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person in a dream about a single girlWhen a single woman sees an unknown person bleeding in a dream. This is reflected in In her psychological state, it means that she has gone through some bad things and events that make her sad. And whoever sees blood flowing from her brother in a dream, he bears responsibility for the family. When she sees blood flowing from a friend, she needs someone to stand by her. And whoever sees blood flowing from someone Her parents, it exhausts him a lot. See also: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person in a dream about a married woman. Seeing blood flowing from an unknown person in a married person’s dream. What proves that she was exposed to an accident or a bad situation and that her husband has He is beaten. But things will go well and life between them will return to normal again. Seeing blood bleeding from the husband’s face in a dream if he is sick, then the dream is good news for his recovery. If he is right and is not suffering from anything, then some of his secrets will be revealed in front of his wife , which will reveal problems between them. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person in a dream about the man and its meaning. If a man sees an unknown child in a dream, he is bleeding profusely. That is, the monarch does not take care of his children and is lagging behind in their rights. Anyone who sees bleeding soon should contact To check their condition. A man who sees an unknown woman in his dream is bleeding and in bad health. This means that his wife is not well and he must approach her, take care of her and try to support her because she is suffering, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about blood on the hand. Meaning of seeing blood in a dream Coming from another person in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation When a pregnant woman dreams of a stranger dripping with blood. This means that her health is not good and that she suffers a lot during pregnancy and she must take care of her health and the health of her fetus. And everyone who sees the doctor with whom she is following up on her pregnancy, or any of the workers in his clinic, Bleeding. She may be exposed to dangers during her birth, and the fetus may be born sick, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming from another person in a dream for young people and its meaning When a young man sees in his dream that someone he knows as friends, neighbors, or acquaintances is bleeding from his face. It is a sign that the fortuneteller does not He loves this person and always avoids approaching him or talking to him. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the mouth. Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream coming out of another person’s face. Blood dripping from the face of a person known to the dreamer in a dream is evidence that this person may be exposed to an embarrassing situation. It indicates This vision also indicates that this person needs support and help from God. Whoever sees an unknown person in a dream and blood is bleeding from his face. The dream may express the dreamer’s bad behavior and irresponsible behavior towards those around him. He must review himself so that he does not become an outcast. Interpretation of a dream about going out Blood from another person's head in a dreamBlood coming out of the head in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is changing his opinions and beliefs

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying tiles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying tiles in a dream. A person, while preparing for his home or a new place, may need to choose the right tiles for him. What are the implications of seeing someone buying tiles in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about buying tiles in a dream: For a girl to buy a bowl of tiles for her home in a dream, this is an indication that she will enjoy great happiness that is unprecedented for her. In a married woman’s dream, seeing her buying a court shows freedom and independence The big one that she lives with her husband. If you see a man buying ceramics in his dream, this means that he will move to a new job in the coming period. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying ceramics, this is a sign that the birth of her child is imminent. Seeing a young man or a pot buying pottery in The dream indicates the approaching marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wiping the floor with a mop in a dream: Seeing the floor being wiped of dirt and its proliferation in the air conditioner, this indicates getting rid of stress and pain and the following forms of vision during this period. To see yourself wiping the floor with a mop also means getting rid of thoughts Negativity and getting rid of the despair that the dreamer suffered from in the past period. Sweeping the floor with a mop indicates goodness, livelihood, abundant money, spacious life, abundance, and the removal of worry and worry. Seeing wiping the floor with a mop indicates that the dreamer is a person who cooperates in his righteousness, piety, and integrity in worshiping God and His commandments. Satisfying desires, overcoming punishments, and removing worries and anxiety. When you see a girl wiping the floor with a mop, this indicates that she has many aspirations, dreams, and hopes, and this indicates the fulfillment of her hopes and dreams and the acquisition of a lot of money and abundance, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about removing tiles from the floor in a dream: seeing removal Tiles from the floor and removing them indicate the problems and fears that the researcher will face in the coming period, and the student will face many difficulties and problems. When you see a man removing tiles during his sleep, this indicates a great test, and if he places them after removing them, this indicates a positive change in his life and its development for the better. Vision. A married woman removing tiles in her dream indicates that she will face some marital problems in the coming period and these problems may lead to divorce. If the dreamer is working and his position is distinguished, this indicates that the dreamer has left this distinguished position that he is in and can leave work completely. In a dream, seeing old tiles removed and removed indicates that the owner will get rid of bad friends and those who negatively affect him and his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sitting on tiles in a dream. In a dream about a bowling girl, seeing her sitting in court indicates her relationship and participation with a poor man and the deterioration of her situation. Financial. Seeing a female student sitting in court in a dream indicates failure and lack of success in her studies in that academic year. When a person sees that he is sitting on a board in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties in the coming period.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shooting in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing gunfire in a dream for individuals. Shooting in a dream shows haste in making a decision and can indicate a change in a life of commitment for the better. Interpretation of a dream about seeing gunshots in a dream, meaning of the dream for a married woman, married woman, pregnant woman and man, meaning of shooting and killing Seeing fire and war, the interpretation of fire and flight, the symbol of fire in the air, and shooting fire in a dream are among the visions of many people who do not find an adequate explanation for this. Therefore, we will talk about that day in detail in this article, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a picture in a dream for single people. Interpretation of a dream about shooting in a dream: The interpretation of seeing a gunshot in a dream is desirable visions that indicate victory over enemies, great livelihoods, and good luck. The dream that Shooting into the air in a dream is evidence of rash and hasty decisions in his life. But seeing a familiar person being shot in a dream means that there are many problems and conflicts with this person that may lead to separation. Dreaming of seeing a thief shot in a dream indicates that he is hypocrites. They are exposed in the life of the dreamer and his situation changes for the better. Seeing shooting a predatory animal in a dream is a sign of a long, good and spacious life and blessings with lawful money. See also: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Explanation of shooting a single woman: The interpretation of the dream in which someone is shot A single woman in general is evidence of a feeling of stability, happiness, security, and psychological comfort. Seeing an unknown person being shot in a single woman’s dream means that fears have passed and that there is a lot of good news. Dreaming of shooting a thief in a dream is evidence that her wedding date is approaching. The right person who loves and appreciates her. This is how seeing a gun fired randomly in a dream for a single woman indicates that she is going through a bad psychological state that makes her unbalanced. Dreaming of seeing a cat in a dream indicates that the unmarried woman will get what she wants and desires in her life. Watch Also: Interpretation of Al-Osaimi’s dream about a gun. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a married woman: Interpretation of seeing a machine gun bullet in a dream for a married woman. This is evidence that she is responsible for her family and that she supports them. Thus, the dream of shooting at a husband in a married woman’s dream indicates many problems and disagreements that may It leads to divorce. Seeing a bullet in the air in a married woman’s dream means that she is dissatisfied with her life and feels despair and disappointment. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a pregnant woman: Seeing a bullet in a dream for a pregnant woman in the first months is evidence that she has given birth to a male child, and God knows best. It indicates Dreaming about hearing the sound of gunshots in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the earliest date of giving birth, which will be easy. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing weapons in a dream for a single, married, pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a man: Seeing a shot in a man’s dream has unfortunate visions that indicate extravagance and spending money. On what is not useful. Dreaming of hearing gunshots in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream through the website vision roy2a.com The dreamer may be surprised and astonished to see a fat person in a dream and begin to wonder and search for its effects. Today, through this article, I will present the interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir and others. Dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the fortuneteller, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dreamSeeing a fat person in a dream It indicates that promising things will happen in the dreamer’s practical life. Obesity in a dream It indicates a lot of good and abundant sustenance for the god in his life Seeing a fat person in a dream also indicates that the fortuneteller is in good health and has a sound body, free of any disease, and God knows best. Many fears and problems in the dreamer’s life during the coming period. Seeing a thin person gaining weight in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller has been deceived by someone, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a fat girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one fat man in a dream. It appears. Many promising things will happen and we will hear good news in the coming period. Shaking hands with a fat person in a single woman’s dream indicates the great success and excellence that she will achieve in her academic and professional life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing someone hugging in a dream Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream for a married woman Married woman sees That her husband is gaining weight in a dream indicates her husband’s long life, good health, and healthy body free of diseases, and God knows best. A strange fat person in a dream for a married woman indicates that the coming year of her life will be full of goodness, food, and blessings, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a fat person in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing in In a dream, an obese pregnant woman eats her food and says that she will soon undergo the birth process and it will be easy and smooth, and God knows best. Obesity in a dream for a pregnant woman, and this indicates that she has a good and comfortable pregnancy and does not suffer from health problems, as she and her fetus are healthy and safe, and God knows best. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a stranger in Interpretation of seeing a fat child in a dream. Seeing a fat child in a dream indicates that the next period of the dreamer’s life will be full of goodness and good luck in his professional and personal life. A fat child in a dream also indicates the end of all the problems and crises that the dreamer is going through in his life. Interpretation of seeing a dead fat person in Seeing a dead person in a dream indicates a good ending and a good position in the afterlife, and God knows best. A fat dead person is hungry in a dream, which indicates that the viewer will go through great financial hardship in the near future. Seeing a deceased person eating fat in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with many blessings, blessings, and relief in the future. His life, and God knows best. See the explanations

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of Ibn Sirin’s mother?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother: One of the most difficult things for a dreamer is to see the death of his mother during his dream. The mother may be alive in reality or actually dead, and in both cases the interpretation is different, and if she cries and is intense, sadness appears in the vision. There are multiple interpretations depending on the condition of the sleeper, because if this scream turns into a scream and a loud sound, then the meanings associated with the dream will be undesirable. A dream, follow us to find out the interpretation of this. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother. There are things that dream experts agree on about certain interpretations, including that death itself in the world of interpretation is not bad, but in most cases it is a sign of age and a happy life, and not the opposite, that is, if you are exposed to a situation If the mother dies in a dream, you should not expect her real death immediately. If the sleeper lost his mother some time ago and sees that she died again in the dream, then he is under the control of weakness and sadness and does not accept her loss and still suffers from painful feelings for him during the death of the living. Her mother shows goodness and the ability to reach the beautiful things she wants, but if this dream is accompanied by crying and screaming, then one is about to get into a big fight over the loss of a loved one, God forbid.Interpretation of a dream about the death of Ibn Sirin’s motherThe mother’s death, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizes beautiful things, not the other way around, and shows that a person who suffers from psychological conflict and great sadness with illness is approaching recovery and deliverance from any fleeting harm. ...When the dreamer's mother has already died and he witnesses her death again, the interpretation explains all the difficult circumstances he went through in the last days after her death and shows the dream's connotation of goodness, with the exception of the appearance of some bad things in the vision. Like crying loudly with a person screaming, and if he wants to bury it, the mother keeps it in a special place and gets a very good promotion soon. The online dream interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Simply type the online dream interpretation site into Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about the death of a single motherSome things can be highlighted in a student’s life when she witnesses the death of her mother while she is alive, as she sees a set of bad circumstances in her education and needs to increase her diligence and learning to succeed So she doesn't need that. Weakness or despair, but sometimes patience is better and leads to excellence. Sometimes the mother is seriously ill and the girl expects any evil to happen to her, such as increasing illness or death, and in this case she encounters some unpleasant events in her dream, such as visiting her and seeing Her death. The issue here is related to her psychological state and the repetition of her thoughts for fear of losing her, but experts in general say that the death of the mother is not bad, but rather it becomes a good omen for her blessed life. Interpretation of the dream of the mother dying while she is alive and crying over her for the sake of the single woman, in the event that the dreamer finds the death of her mother while she is single. Alive and started crying for her, she may be in a bad situation because of the distance of

Like crying loudly with a person screaming, and if he wants to bury it, the mother keeps it in a special place and gets a very good promotion soon. The online dream interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Simply type the online dream interpretation site into Google and get the correct interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about the death of a single motherSome things can be highlighted in a student’s life when she witnesses the death of her mother while she is alive, as she sees a set of bad circumstances in her education and needs to increase her diligence and learning to succeed So she doesn't need that. Weakness or despair, but sometimes patience is better and leads to excellence. Sometimes the mother is seriously ill and the girl expects any evil to happen to her, such as increasing illness or death, and in this case she encounters some unpleasant events in her dream, such as visiting her and seeing Her death. The issue here is related to her psychological state and the repetition of her thoughts for fear of losing her, but experts in general say that the death of the mother is not bad, but rather it becomes a good omen for her blessed life. Interpretation of the dream of the mother dying while she is alive and crying over her for the sake of the single woman, in the event that the dreamer finds the death of her mother while she is single. Alive and started crying for her, she may be in a bad situation because of the distance of

title: More than 30 interpretations of seeing a dream about coconuts by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What do you know about the interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream by leading scholars? Coconut is a fruit that grows in tropical regions and is used in many industries, whether in food or cosmetics. Interpretation of seeing a dream about coconut in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about coconut in a dream. It was taken Some interpreters interpret this vision with different connotations, which are as follows: The first sign: weddings, many happy occasions, and reaching a state of joy in which the dreamer forgets the difficulties of the past. The second sign: If the coconut is white, this is a sign that most of the problems faced by the fortuneteller will soon end. The sign Third: Getting closer to realizing all ambitions and realizing the largest volume of plans that have been abandoned for a long time. In general, the coconut indicates that the dreamer will receive an unexpected financial reward, in exchange for performing many services that he has provided to others without expecting anything in return from anyone. Seeing coconuts in a dream constantly indicates the position that the dreamer will occupy in the future. Whoever sees that he is in a large orchard with a lot of nuts and eating them, will receive a large sum of money to meet his growing needs and make him unable to live. Eating a coconut also symbolizes that the dreamer's people are faithful to what they say. There is a common opinion that says that seeing a coconut in a dream shows the skill of astrology, or more precisely that the fortuneteller has a sixth sense and a strong sense. Information about these people, just by looking at what they say, can deduce a lot. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of seeing a coconut in a dream by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of dreaming of a coconut in a dream is one of the interpretations that It has more than one meaning, because a man’s vision is different from a woman’s vision, and a pregnant woman’s interpretation of her dream is different from a pregnant woman’s vision. An unmarried woman. Mainly, most of the interpretations before us, there is almost agreement among them that the coconut indicates sustenance and good news from God in the actions that the seer plans and then carries out, whether these actions are in the professional aspect. As for the formation of a family and its stability, Ibn Sirin believes that the coconut is one of the fruits that occupies the forefront with some other fruits, which indicates good vision. The first meaning: This fruit indicates the acceptance of happy events, the death of misfortunes, the appearance of unexpected things, patience in distress, and not giving up. Quickly indicates the difficult times that the dreamer is going through, and these times are a test from God. Coconut generally indicates upcoming joy. The second meaning is the meaning in which Ibn Sirin relied on the white color of coconut, because the white color is a sign of inner purity, freedom from grudges, and avoiding what does not please God. Coconut in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin mentioned that A coconut in a person’s dream is God Almighty’s good news of soon relief, as it indicates a shift in the situation from one state to another, from loneliness to despair.

title: What is the interpretation of hugging in a dream?

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of hugging in a dream, which is considered one of the most beloved actions and close to people’s hearts, as it makes a person feel supported, but not every topic is pleasant on earth and, by extension, desirable in dreams and visions, so scholars differed in interpreting the dream of hugging in a dream, They emphasized that the interpretation varies depending on the dream itself and the viewer’s location regarding the hug. Some scholars interpreted hugging as success and the achievement of goals and ambitions, and others interpreted it as evidence of fear, anxiety and insecurity, so through our article today we will discuss the interpretation of hugs in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and other interpreters. And identifying the real signs of hugging in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women, and the interpretation changes whether the hug is accompanied by crying or not. All of this and more are detailed in an encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of a hug in a dreamInterpretation of a hug in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin confirmed that if he finds a fortune teller in his dream That he embraces someone he knows, this indicates that the fortuneteller is accompanying him or suits him. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is embracing his enemy, this indicates a lot of goodness on his way to the dreamer, and perhaps reconciliation between the two quarrels. But if the dreamer sees himself hugging a woman in his dream, This indicates abundant kindness and abundant strength. While if the dreamer is a woman and dreams that she is hugging a man, this is a sign of support and assistance. But if the dreamer embraces someone who has left our world (dead), then this indicates migration or exile and pilgrimage to a far away place. Interpretation of hugging and crying in A dream according to Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer is masculine and dreams of embracing a woman, then this indicates the abundance of goodness and ample living that he will encounter in the days following the vision. But if the dreamer dreams that he is hugging a man like him, then this indicates poverty and that the dreamer needs help. But if the embrace is accompanied by quiet and gentle crying It is a sign of the abundance of money and food, getting rid of anxiety and getting rid of sorrows. If the crying with the embrace is intense, it is a sign of farewell and separation. As for the beholder embracing the dead person, while embracing him with intense crying, it is evidence of the dreamer losing his religion or doing forbidden things. And if he hugs The dreamer is a woman crying intensely in her dream, this indicates poverty and a great loss of money. Interpretation of a strong hug in a dream for a single woman. If the girl is single or has never been married before, then she sees in a dream that she is hugging a man she does not know, then this indicates the presence of a good young man on her way. In a dream, embracing an unmarried person is considered a harbinger of the arrival of her partner and a sign of an imminent marriage. This partner makes her happy and enjoys warmth, love, happiness, and affection, and God knows best. As for an unmarried girl who dreams of hugging someone she knows, this is evidence of the development of the relationship between them and indicates his good condition and morals. If a girl hugs her lover, this means that their wedding date is near, and God knows best. If a girl dreams of hugging one of her deceased parents, this is evidence of her fear, her feeling of insecurity and instability, and her anxiety about the future. Interpretation

title: Learn about the interpretation of digging in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Digging in a dream. Digging in a dream is one of those dreams that tells the dreamer many things related to his life in general, whether good or poetic, and this is according to the signs that appeared in the dream. Digging in a dream. Seeing holes in a dream is a bad deed, it is evidence of deception and cunning. And unwanted things and symbolize a series of bad interpretations, such as an attempt by those around the fortuneteller to deceive him and harm him. If digging leads to the appearance of water in a dream, it is a good omen that removes worries and removes difficult problems that stand in the way of the dreamer’s life in general. When the dreamer constantly digs without It stops during the dream and does not achieve anything, this means that the person is exposed to many useless arguments and the dreamer will fall into many crises without needing them, and God knows best. Also, digging in the dream indicates that there are many undesirable things that will happen soon in the life of the fortuneteller, He must be careful and patient with sadness until he gets rid of those obstacles that have appeared in his life. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, search for the site Google the Dream Interpretation Secrets. Digging into the dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing misery in a dream is a bad thing, and it symbolizes many things. The dreamer may be exposed to it in reality. If the dreamer becomes ill and sees in his dream that he is digging a large hole, this means that the illness may become more severe on him and make him more tired, so he must follow the doctors’ instructions, and be careful to stay in bed. Briefly. If the fortuneteller will travel soon and sees in a dream that he is digging a hole, this means that the fortuneteller will earn a lot of money in the coming period and appreciate the dirt he dug from the hole in the dream. In case the dreamer sees someone he knows digging a hole and forcing him to do so, this means that The dreamer will face a big problem from that person and a number of new things will happen to him because of him. He must get rid of this person because he is evil and the dreamer does not intend any good by him. If a person sees himself eating from the dirt of the hole he dug, it is interpreted that the dreamer will gain money according to what he ate from that dirt, and God knows best. Digging in a dream for a single woman in case the dreamer sees in Dreaming that he was digging a hole, it means that he will get a lot of good things in reality and that he will get very good things in the coming period. When the dreamer dreams that she is digging with a young man she knows, it means that this young man wants to marry her soon. If a girl digs a hole In a dream and she sees that she wants to enter it, this indicates that she is an obedient person and loves to approach God in various ways and seeks Him, and God Almighty helps her to approach Him and do it. Good behavior. If the fortuneteller saw that she was digging a big hole, but she was happy with it and wanted to continue digging, this indicates that she will reach her goal in life and that she is trying to build her future and strives hard to reach it. Dreams that he wanted before. Digging in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is digging a hole in a dream, removing the dirt from it and preparing it well for sitting

title: What do you know about the interpretation of a dream about pepper according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing pepper in a dream and its interpretation by leading scholars. We will find seeing a dream of pepper in a dream. The dreamer will find more than one type of pepper in his dream, such as green, red, and black. Since the dream is of great importance, we decided on an Egyptian website to provide an interpretation of each type separately, knowing that we will mention the strongest interpretations. Narrated by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Miller and others. Follow the paragraphs below to easily interpret your dreams. Pepper in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about pepper refers to saved money and this dream has an indirect interpretation, which is that the dreamer will reach the point of saving money, and therefore it will be financially hidden and cover all his basic personal requirements and demands. A family consisting of children and a wife. Ibn Sirin also said that the symbol of green pepper in a dream speaks of the dreamer’s personality, as he will be one of those people who cares a lot about his money and its preservation, and this indicates many of the characteristics of the dreamer, which are: First grade: He is a healthy person who realizes Money does not come easily until he spends it easily and without care. The second advantage: his ability to plan and manage money, study his material needs, and provide the necessary funds for them, and what is surplus of it is not spent in luxury, but rather saved to remain safe from the evil and betrayal of the coming days. And the amazing conditions in it, such as health conditions, material influences, etc. The third advantage: consistency in attitude and the ability to ignore all the temptations presented to him, and therefore the dream suggests that the dreamer is a person with a goal, because saving money must have a reason in life, and this reason is determined by him. His life. The dreamer may want to save to protect his children, that is, marry them, or create his own project, and may set a goal for himself, which is to escape from his current social level. Stronger level. Three visions of green pepper in an unmarried woman’s dream give an interpretation, which is achievement and success in achieving a valuable goal soon, and the jurists said that the visions interpreted with this interpretation are; A virgin dreamed that she was eating green peppers, so she entered the market and bought a quantity of them, to use them to prepare a meal in the dream. An unmarried woman’s vision of having a quantity of fresh green peppers in her home leads to a wonderful diet for her to live in, and we will soon explain five types of this upcoming diet for her. And for her family. The first type: If her father or mother is physically ill, then the green pepper is a sign that both of them have emerged from their health crisis and that they are in good health, God willing. The second type: If the material needs in her life and her family are few and insufficient for them, then the vision brings money. The more pepper in the vision, the more money. The third type: If the dreamer has a brother or sister in a crisis, God will do justice to them and solve their crises. The fourth type: If a family member is a party to a case and is waiting for a decision, God will give him good news and he will emerge unscathed. The fifth type: If the family suffers from the lack of a spirit of cohesion and cohesion within it, it will soon be blessed with happiness and family ties that will establish hope and joy in their souls. Ibn Siri emphasized
